name: puntodeventa
description: An Electron application with React and TypeScript
author: Javier Dominguez

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typecheck && electron-vite build
scripts.gen: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.build:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder --linux
